segment.source: How to Add an Administrator Group
segment.target: How to Add an Administrator Group

segment.source: How to Add an Administrator Group
segment.target: How to Add an Administrator Group

segment.source: How to Add an Administrator Group
segment.target: How to Add an Administrator Group

segment.source: From the Administrators node of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, you can use the following procedure to add an administrator group.
segment.target: From the Administrators node of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, you can use the following procedure to add an administrator group.

segment.source: In the left pane of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, right-click the Administrators node and select Add Administrator Group.
segment.target: In the left pane of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, right-click the Administrators node and select Add Administrator Group.

segment.source: Complete the Select Groups dialog box to add groups.
segment.target: Complete the Select Groups dialog box to add groups.

segment.source: When completing the Select Groups dialog box, you might see the Multiple Names Found dialog box, which can display multiple group names.
segment.target: When completing the Select Groups dialog box, you might see the Multiple Names Found dialog box, which can display multiple group names.

segment.source: To add more than one group at a time, press Ctrl and click the name of each group you want to add.
segment.target: To add more than one group at a time, press Ctrl and click the name of each group you want to add.

segment.source: Click OK to exit the Multiple Names Found dialog box.
segment.target: Click OK to exit the Multiple Names Found dialog box.

segment.source: To add administrator groups to the Application Virtualization Management Server, you must have system administrator or security administrator privileges on the associated data store.
segment.target: To add administrator groups to the Application Virtualization Management Server, you must have system administrator or security administrator privileges on the associated data store.

segment.source: If you attempt to create a group without sufficient privileges, the system generates an error message.
segment.target: If you attempt to create a group without sufficient privileges, the system generates an error message.
